title: Kota Sugawara
text:
is a Japanese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who played for <a href="Kochi%20United%20SC">Kochi United SC</a> of the <a href="Shikoku%20Soccer%20League">Shikoku Soccer League</a>, scoring 49 goals in 3 seasons.
Club statistics.
"Updated to 20 February 2016".
